定时触发.name: ScheduledTrigger
定时触发.description: When calling a function, if it is triggered by a schedule, then output the corresponding fields

独立 Agent.name: IndependentAIAgents
独立 Agent.description: The main AI agent gives instructions to the independent AI agent via a plain text natural language description; after processing, the independent AI agent returns the results to the main AI agent.

搜索需求.name: SearchRequirement
搜索需求.字段描述: Describe the search requirements in natural language.

返回需求.name: ReturnRequirement
返回需求.数据格式:
Return original data
Return after summary
Directly display to the user

数据.name: Data
数据.数据格式:
All the searched data need to be displayed, and specific fields may be displayed according to the retrieval requirements.

Data ID is a required field

Data format is determined by R&D.

总结结果.name: SummaryResult
总结结果.字段描述: The user data search AI agent returns the search results, summarized/answered according to the search requirements.

展示内容.name: DisplayContent
展示内容.字段描述: Content directly displayed to the user

错误信息.name: ErrorMessage
错误信息.数据格式: Tell the AI that the required data was not found.

网络搜索 Agent.name: WebSearchAIAgent
网络搜索 Agent.description: The main AI agent gives the search requirements to the web search AI agent; the web search AI agent breaks down the search requirements into single or multiple search tasks for one or more search channels, and gives it to the system for retrieval. The search results are summarized by the web search AI agent, and the conclusions are given back to the main AI agent. Alternatively, the web pages found can be given directly the main AI agent.

搜索需求.name: SearchRequirement
搜索需求.字段描述: Describe the search requirements in natural language.

返回需求.name: ReturnRequirement
返回需求.数据格式:
Display summarized information to the user (invoke web search AI agent to summarize content)
Show the result web page to the user (invoke the browser on the client side)

文本处理 Agent.name: TextProcessingAIAgent
文本处理 Agent.description: Used to process a piece of plain text (abbreviations, tone adjustment, translation, etc.)

原文.name: OriginalText
原文.字段描述: Describe the search requirements in natural language.

处理需求.name: ProcessingRequirement
处理需求.字段描述: Describe the processing requirements in natural language.

处理结果.name: ProcessingResult
处理结果.数据格式: Plain text
